data.title: Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: DysFunktional Family (2003) cast and crew credits, including actors, actresses, directors, writers and more.
data.text:
Edit

Directed by

George Gallo

Writing Credits (in alphabetical order)

Eddie Griffin ... (head writer)

Cast (in credits order) complete, awaiting verification

Eddie Griffin ... Self Joe Howard ... Father Matthew Brent ... Self Robert Noble ... Self

Produced by

Paul Brooks ... producer Eddie Griffin ... producer Jeff Levine ... co-producer Steve Longi ... co-producer Scott Niemeyer ... co-executive producer David Permut ... producer

Music by

Andrew Gross

Cinematography by

Theo van de Sande

Editing by

Michael R. Miller

Makeup Department

Bret Mayo ... hair stylist (uncredited)

Production Management

Dave Abbitt ... production supervisor (as David Abbitt) Douglas Jones ... unit production manager

Second Unit Director or Assistant Director

Wendi Lampassi ... first assistant director: additional photography

Sound Department

Christopher Alba ... sound editor Sandy Berman ... supervising sound editor David Bondelevitch ... dialogue editor / sound editor Michael Camello ... adr mixer / foley mixer / sound editor Joey Domaracki ... sound utility Eddie Kim ... sound editor James Azizi Penny ... sound editor Eryne Prine ... sound editor Larry Scharf ... sound Solange S. Schwalbe ... adr supervisor Kelly Vandever ... re-recording mixer David S. Di Pietro ... group adr (uncredited)

Visual Effects by

Christopher Dusendschon ... digital imaging: iO FILM Jared Sandrew ... digital effects artist Dan Schmit ... visual effects producer

Camera and Electrical Department

David A. Canning ... hd engineer Fred Folmer ... key grip Simon Jayes ... camera operator Mosh Levin ... camera operator D. Stevens ... still photographer Mark N. Woods ... crane operator: Technocrane

Editorial Department

Lisa Cossettini ... assistant editor Joe Fineman ... post-production consultant Mato ... color timer Michael Toji ... post production supervisor

Location Management

Meg MacRae ... location manager

Music Department

Timothy 'China Black' Hom ... composer: additional music Randy Gerston ... music supervisor Jim Gittum ... composer: additional music Suge Knight ... composer: additional score (as Marion 'Suge' Knight) Brian Leff ... music coordinator Joshua Winget ... music editor

Additional Crew

Michael Barnes ... financial legal services Jackie Bazan ... publicist Anderson Byrd ... security: Mr. Griffin Asia De Marcos ... production assistant Chris Doss ... executive in charge of finance Suraj Gohill ... production lender Nicole J. Hall ... assistant: Mr. Niemeyer (as Nicole Hall) Joanna L. Rees Jones ... executive in charge of post production Sandra Lee ... product placement & marketing (as a different name) Steve Longi ... additional footage Meg MacRae ... assistant production coordinator Adam R. Mehr ... attorney Paul Mooney ... consultant (as Mr. Paul Mooney) Ryan Romkema ... set production assistant Wilbert Thomas ... assistant: Mr. Griffin (as Wilbert 'Baby' Thomas) Bill Vergos ... key office production assistant Evan Wasserstrom ... assistant: Mr. Gallo
